verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come and go with me
To my Father's house x3
Come and go with me
To my Father's house
There is joy, joy, joy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is the way
To my Father's house x3
Jesus is the way
To my Father's house
There is joy, joy, joy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Family will be there
In my Father's house x3
Family will be there
In my Father's house
There is joy, joy, joy
